author: AA Picks
title: Google Pixel Bundle Giveaway
text:
You may not have heard of the Google Pixel , but –
Oh, you have then. Okay, well then I probably don’t have to tell you that it’s a pretty unassuming little gadget that failed to gain much popularity in the –
What? It’s massively popular? Oh…
And the specs are…?
You don’t say.
That’s pretty impressive actually. Okay, now I kind of want one too.
Anyway, Tech Deals is giving away a Google Pixel for the low, low price of free! No strings attached. The only thing you need to be eligible is an email address.
But that’s not all. In addition to the Pixel , you’ll also get Google’s virtual assistant Google Home and a Daydream View VR headset . Altogether, that’s $857 worth of tech that you’re getting for free.
I know that nobody is actually reading the words I’m typing anymore because they’ve all already jetted off to the giveaway, so here I am talking to myself on the internet, but in the event that anyone is still on this page, click the button below to sign up for your chance to win a Google Pixel ! 
Register to Win! The AAPicks team only spotlights legitimate, verified deals. If you’re not satisfied with this product, Tech Deals offers a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you have questions or concerns, please reach out at aapicks@androidauthority.com .
